Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), with yttrium stabilized zirconia (YSZ) as electrolyte, composite of strontium-doped lanthanum manganate (LSM) and YSZ as cathode, and cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC) as anode, are prepared and tested with 5wt% Fe-loaded activated carbon as fuel and ambient air as oxidant.
Titulo: Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that electricity and CO gas can be cogenerated in the direct carbon SOFCs through the electrochemical oxidation of CO and the Boudouard reaction.
Titulo: Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The gas electricity cogeneration performances are investigated by taking the operating time of the DC-SOFCs as a measure of rate decrease of the Boudouard reaction.
Titulo: Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three single cells and a two-cell-stack are tested and characterized in terms of electrical power output, CO production rate, electrical conversion efficiency, and overall conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It turns out that a rapid rate of the Boudouard reaction is necessary for getting high electrical power and CO production.
Titulo: Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Taking the emitted CO as part of the power output, an overall efficiency of 76.5% for the single cell, and of 72.5% for the stack, is obtained.
Titulo: Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells
Electrochemical gas-electricity cogeneration through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells
